data.message: Thank you Facebook !for allowing me to be in touch with my first love,The first person I look up when I joined Facebook in 2008  he wasn't on Facebook at that time in  2013 he sent me a friend request I did not accept it because he was using a different name I wasn't familiar with a picture of his daughter, in November 2013 was his sisters birthday and she is my friend on Facebook so I saw the same person  say happy birthday sis and at that time and request accepted right away fast-forward one year later we are happily married in the long distance marriage. Thank you Facebook now I am married to my first love.

replies.message: Great story to hear, Charmaine! Thank you for sharing and hope you have a great day. -Sarah
